name: capacitor-authkit-example
description: Example demonstrating WorkOS AuthKit integration in a Capacitor app

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,app "pnpm -F backend dev" "pnpm -F capacitor-app dev"
scripts.ios: pnpm build:app && pnpm sync:ios && pnpm -F capacitor-app open:ios
scripts.android: pnpm build:app && pnpm sync:android && pnpm -F capacitor-app open:android

author: WorkOS
